> Gentlemen.   
>     I am re-shuffling my stuff an=

igned, round, iron, and has gold inlayed lines.   I can post photos or cont=
act directly.   I will probably sell this piece as it at 3 1/8 inch diamete=
r is a bit small for the 1860s sword I had intended it for.    Dennis
